signatures.text: fun CharSequence.splitToSequence( vararg delimiters: String, ignoreCase: Boolean = false, limit: Int = 0): Sequence<String>
signatures.desc: Splits this char sequence to a sequence of strings around occurrences of the specified delimiters.

signatures.text: fun CharSequence.splitToSequence( vararg delimiters: Char, ignoreCase: Boolean = false, limit: Int = 0): Sequence<String>
signatures.desc: Splits this char sequence to a sequence of strings around occurrences of the specified delimiters.

signatures.text: fun CharSequence.splitToSequence( regex: Regex, limit: Int = 0): Sequence<String>
signatures.desc: Splits this char sequence to a sequence of strings around matches of the given regular expression.
